location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, on board the HC Cruizer Benaresto James Pringle Riach, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is instructing Mr Riach to forward two letters (not present) to Shiraz from the Governor of Bombay, addressed to Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mirzā, Prince at Sheraz, and Mohommed Ali Khan [Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān] respectively. It further requests that a letter of acknowledgement is also sent to Mohomed Zekee Khan, along with an explanation of the Resident's absence from Bushire.
